solution_line_template: Mrs. Brown's ${value_50_bill} bills amount to ${value_50_bill} x {num_50_bills} = $<<{value_50_bill}*{num_50_bills}={amount_from_50_bills}>>{amount_from_50_bills}.
So Mrs. Brown's utility bills cost ${amount_from_50_bills} + ${amount_from_10_bills} = $<<{amount_from_50_bills}+{amount_from_10_bills}={total_utility_bills}>>{total_utility_bills}.
